result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Nastasijha A Cruz not in court.  Attorney Michael Jude appeared by video for Nastasijha A Cruz.  Attorney Amanda Kirklewski in court on behalf of Attorney James C Griffin for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in court for a status conference.  Court addresses Justice Point discharge report.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a bench warrant to be issued with REMAND TO JUDGE upon return of the bench warrant. Court took no action on bail.  Any future court dates pending bench warrant are vacated.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE JUDGE ON RETURN OF THE BENCH WARRANT.
Court scheduled a status conference to address Justice Point report with Defense and client on October 28, 2022 at 1:30 PM.  Parties notified of court date.  Case adjourned to Branch 2, Rm 635 CH.

CASE HELD OFF THE RECORD PER JUDGE. 
Defendant Nastasijha A Cruz not in court.  Attorney Michael Jude not in court.  Attorney Gerald Alder in court on behalf of Attorney James C Griffin for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in court for a status conference.  Defense requests another status date.  No objection from the State.  Court scheduled the matter as requested.  Case adjourned to Branch 2, Rm 635 CH.
Status conference scheduled for November 30, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Received and Filed: Pretrial Services Discharge Report - 10-10-2022
Received and Filed: Pretrial Services Violation Report - 10-03-2022

10:14 AM Defendant Nastasijha A Cruz in court.  Attorney Michael Jude in court for Nastasijha A Cruz.  Prosecuting attorney Thomas Hasle in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case set for a Preliminary Hearing. Parties are advised that this case is assigned to Branch 02, Judge Childs. Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing. Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court held colloquy with defendant. Probable cause has been found and the defendant is bound over for trial. Original Information e-filed, copy given to defense counsel who waived reading. Defense enters a plea of not guilty on behalf of the defendant. Case remains calendared for status 10/25/2022 at 8:30am in Br. 02.

Defendant Nastasijha A Cruz not in court, in custody.  Attorney Michael Jude appeared by video for Nastasijha A Cruz.  Attorney James C Griffin appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in court for a status conference.  Attorney Michael Jude appointed and has not received discovery or an offer.  Preliminary hearing has not yet been held.  Court scheduled a preliminary hearing and status conference.  Case adjourned for a preliminary hearing in Branch PE, Rm 146 CJF.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 30, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Status conference scheduled for October 25, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Received and Filed: Attorney Michael Jude

Defendant Nastasijha A Cruz not in court, in custody.  Prosecuting attorney Abby Rockendorf in court in person for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case is set for a Preliminary Hearing. State's Witness is present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Case is adjourned. Court orders case adjourned for CAUSE for Status of Counsel.
Status conference scheduled for September 30, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Nastasijha A Cruz not in court, defendant in custody.  Abby Rockendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness was present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 24, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered no contact with MSW, RAM, LKT
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.

CASE HEARD OFF THE RECORD DUE TO TECHNICAL DIFFICULTIES: 
 Defendant Nastasijha A Cruz in court with attorney Vincent Paul Guimont.  Defendant Nastasijha A Cruz in custody.  Sara Waldschmidt-DeSmet appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   All parties appeared by video conference.
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Childs, Branch 02.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 3, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
